name: No. 8
description: The Kings Ginger helps emphasize the delicately earthy flavor of unsmoked Fidencio mezcal in this refreshing spin on the Paloma from John John McCarthy of Whitehall and Mary Queen of Scots in NYC.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce fresh ruby red grapefruit juice
1 ounce Fidencio Sin Humo (no smoke) Mezcal (see note)
Garnish: Orange twist or orange wheel

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime juice, grapefruit juice, King's Ginger, mezcal, and orange bitters to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass, garnish with orange twist or orange wheel and serve.
